properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I've found the pearl of greatest price, My heart doth sing for joy: And sing I must, a Christ I have; O what a Christ have I?

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Christ is my prophet, priest and king, A Prophet full of light, A Priest that stands 'twixt God and man, A King that rules with might.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: My Christ he is the Lord of lords, He is the King of kings; He is the Sun of righteousness, With healing in his wings.

verse.name: v4
v5
verse.lines: Christ is my meat, Christ is my drink, My medicine and my health, My peace, my strength, my joy, my crown, My glory and my wealth.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Christ is my father, and my friend, My brother and my love; My head, my hope, my counselor, My advocate above.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: My Christ, he is the Heaven of heavens, My Christ what shall I call? My Christ is first, my Christ is last, My Christ is all in all.
